plain: Based on the user's favourite books, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is mystery, their favourite kind of plot is complex and multi-layered, their favourite setting is Victorian England, their favourite writing style is descriptive and evocative, their favourite length is novel-length, their favourite topic is historical fiction, their favourite pacing is slow-burn, their favourite narrative structure is third-person omniscient, and their favourite themes are mystery, intrigue, and historical accuracy.
